actions.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A063) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA) to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to strike language that sets up a new procedural criteria for an FMCSA study on minimum trucking insurance that is already underway.
purpose: An amendment No. 22 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to strike language that sets up a new procedural criteria for an FMCSA study on minimum trucking insurance that is already underway.
